person.note: Eldest son William Blanchard Jerrold wrote Life and Remains of Douglas Jerrold (1859); also edited The Wit and Opinions of Douglas Jerrold (1858), and The Works of Douglas Jerrold, with a memoir by his son, W. B. Jerrold, in 1863–64, which was never completed. See also Michael Slater. Douglas Jerrold: A Life (1803–1857).

person.ref: The Extravaganzas of J. R. Planché, esq., (Somerset Herald) 1825–1871 1879, 5 vols.
Suggestions for establishing an English Art Theatre, 1879.

person.note: OBP has many titles; 5 titles in Adelphi calendar

OBP has titles; there is a volume of collected plays in Hathitrust but inaccessible; HT also "Letter to the Rev. T. Binney, in defence of the drama; showing the futility of the objections made by him against theatrical amusements"(1838); proquest biog
